UI_SETTINGS.UPLOAD_BACKGROUND_FILE: Kliknij i wybierz nowe tło, lub przeciągnij i upuść je tutaj.

BROWSER.URL_DOC: Odnośnik może być strumieniem URL lub zdalnym plikiem M3U lub PLS

MY_MUSIC.UPDATE_DOC: Zaktualizuj wpisy muzycznej bazy danych dla wszelkich zmienionych, nowych lub usuniętych plików
MY_MUSIC.RESCAN_DOC: Zbuduj od nowa wpisy muzyczną bazę danych dla wszystkich plików

PLUGINS.DROP: Kliknij i wybierz wtyczkę lub przeciągnij i upuść plik wtyczki tutaj.

TRACK_INFO_BAR.CONSUME_PLAYLIST: Usuwaj odtworzony utwór z listy odtwarzania

NETWORKFS.NAS_PATH_DOC: Nazwa zasobu sieciowego lub ścieżka katalogu
NETWORKFS.NAME: Nazwa
NETWORKFS.PLACEHOLDER_IP_ADDRESS: Adres IP lub Nazwa Serwera NAS

WIZARD.NAME: Nazwa
WIZARD.DEVICE_ADDRESS: To urządzenie będzie dostępne na adresie:
WIZARD.ADD_YOUR_MUSIC: Aby dodać swoją muzykę, po prostu podłącz dysk USB lub kliknij przycisk poniżej, aby dodać dysk sieciowy
WIZARD.GET_APPS: Dla wygody, możesz również skorzystać z naszych przydatnych aplikacji
WIZARD.WIFI_CONNECTION: Wybierz sieć bezprzewodową, z którą chcesz się połączyć
WIZARD.DEVICE_CODE_MESSAGE: Jeśli otrzymałeś kod aktywacji ze swoim urządzeniem, wprowadź go, aby skorzystać z ekskluzywnych funkcji zarezerwowanych dla Ciebie.
WIZARD.ERROR_ACTIVATING_DEVICE: Nie udało się aktywować Twojego urządzenia
WIZARD.DEVICE_ACTIVATED: Twoje urządzenie zostało pomyślnie aktywowane. Możesz teraz cieszyć się swoimi ekskluzywnymi funkcjami.
WIZARD.EXPERIENCE_SETTINGS_TEXT: Wolisz łatwy w obsłudze system z uproszczonym zestawem opcji, czy też chcesz mieć pełną kontrolę nad wszystkimi zaawansowanymi funkcjami?
WIZARD.EXPERIENCE_SETTINGS_TEXT_2: To ustawienie można później zmienić w ustawieniach systemu

ALARM.CRATE_PLAYLIST_FIRST: Aby korzystać z budzika, musisz najpierw utworzyć co najmniej jedną listę odtwarzania

MYVOLUMIO.RECOVER_PASSWORD_TEXT: Please fill the form to recover your password
MYVOLUMIO.PAY_DESC: Complete the subscription by paying securely to get your account activated and unleash the full power of MyVolumio right now!
MYVOLUMIO.CANNOT_DOWNGRADE_NO_PLAN: An error occurred, it seems you're not paying any subscription for this plan. Please contact the support.
MYVOLUMIO.NOT_LOGGED_IN: You're not logged in. Please login to continue
MYVOLUMIO.CONFIRM_DELETE_ACCOUNT: Are you sure you want to delete your account? All your profile data, subscriptions and settings will be deleted
MYVOLUMIO.RESEND_VERIFICATION_EMAIL: Did not receive the verification email? Resend my verification email now
MYVOLUMIO.VERIFICATION_DONE_NOW_REMYVOLUMIO: I have already verified my account, make me log-in again now!
MYVOLUMIO.PLEASE_VERIFY_EMAIL_DESC: To use MyVolumio at its full potential, please click on the verification link we've sent to your email
MYVOLUMIO.USER_EMAIL_NOT_VERIFIED: Your email has not been verified
MYVOLUMIO.ERROR_CHANGE_PLAN_NO_PREVIOUS_PLAN_FOUND: Error, you don't have any plan yet
MYVOLUMIO.USER_MISSING_MANDATORY_FIELDS: Please fill all the required fields
MYVOLUMIO.USER_VERIFICATION_EMAIL_SENT_DESC: A verification email has just been sent to your mailbox, check it and click on the verification link to enable your account
MYVOLUMIO.DEVICE_CONFIRM_ENABLE: Are you sure to enable this device?
MYVOLUMIO.DEVICE_CONFIRM_DISABLE: Are you sure to disable this device?
MYVOLUMIO.DEVICE_CONFIRM_DELETE: Are you sure to delete this device?
MYVOLUMIO.PAYING_DESC: Please wait meanwhile the transaction occurs.
MYVOLUMIO.PAYMENT_FAIL_DESC: We're sorry, but the payment has failed! Please check your card data and availability and try again. If the problem persist please contact the support.
MYVOLUMIO.MAX_DEVICES_ALERT_DESCRIPTION: You have already activated the max number of allowed MyVolumio Devices, please disable MyVolumio from one of the previous devices or upgrade your plan. If you continue the oldest MyVolumio Device will be disabled in favor of the new one. Do you wish to continue?
MYVOLUMIO.NO_SUBSCRIPTION_SELECTED_DESC: Error. No subscribtion has been selected! Please select a subscription.
MYVOLUMIO.ERROR_SERVER_TIMEOUT: We're sorry but the server it's taking too much to respond. Please try again.
MYVOLUMIO.NOT_LOGGED: You're not logged. Please log-in or sign-up.
MYVOLUMIO.ERROR_VALIDATION_TERMS_UNACCEPTED: Please accept the Terms of Service
MYVOLUMIO.ACCOUNT_EXISTS_WITH_DIFFERENT_CREDENTIAL: Account already exist by a different login provider.
MYVOLUMIO.CONFIRM_CHANGE_PLAN: Do you really want to change your plan? You will be automatically charged with the new plan price difference
MYVOLUMIO.CONFIRM_CANCEL_PLAN: Do you really want to cancel your plan? From now on, you will not be able to use MyVolumio Services.
MYVOLUMIO.PROBLEMS_WITH_PAYMENT: Problems with your payment method, please update it
MYVOLUMIO.RECOVER_PASSWORD_SENT_MESSAGE: We just sent instructions on how to reset your password to your mail, check it out
MYVOLUMIO.KEEP_ME_UPDATED_VIA_MAIL: Keep me updated with the latest Volumio news via email
MYVOLUMIO.MY_VOLUMIO_SHORTDESC: MyVolumio is the premium tier of your Volumio experience. Sign up for premium services like TIDAL and QOBUZ integration, CD Ripping, Bluetooth input and much more
MYVOLUMIO.SUPPORT_MYVOLUMIO: Support Volumio’s development and get premium features for the price of an espresso per month.
MYVOLUMIO.SUPPORT_MYVOLUMIO_SHORT: Support us and get premium features
MYVOLUMIO.PREMIUM_STREAMING_FULLY_INTEGRATED_QOBUZ: Qobuz is fully integrated with Volumio
MYVOLUMIO.PREMIUM_STREAMING_FULLY_INTEGRATED_TIDAL: Tidal is fully integrated with Volumio
MYVOLUMIO.PREMIUM_STREAMING_AVAILABILITY_QOBUZ: Qobuz is available for MyVolumio Virtuoso and Superstar users.
MYVOLUMIO.PREMIUM_STREAMING_AVAILABILITY_TIDAL: Tidal is available for MyVolumio Virtuoso and Superstar users.
MYVOLUMIO.MORE_INFO_DESCRIPTION: Get premium features and support the development of Volumio.
MYVOLUMIO.PREMIUM_STREAMING_FEATURE_2: Studio quality sound - FLAC 24-Bit up to 192 KHz
MYVOLUMIO.PREMIUM_STREAMING_FEATURE_4: Sync your favourites and playlists to Volumio
MYVOLUMIO.CODE_DEVICE_ALREADY_ACTIVATED: Your device code has already been successfully activated and your plan is
MYVOLUMIO.WIN_PRIZES_REFERRING_VOLUMIO: Refer your friends to MyVolumio and get awesome rewards!
MYVOLUMIO.SIGNUP_ERROR_CONTACT_SUPPORT: Something went wrong during your signup. Please contact our support at support@volumio.org providing the following error information:
MYVOLUMIO.REFERRING_EXPLANATION: Win premium plans after milestones or beat our monthly leaderboard challenge and win a MyVolumio Superstar subscription for life!
MYVOLUMIO.REFERRAL_SUBTITLE: Get rewarded for sharing Volumio with your friends. Invite them by using your unique link below.
MYVOLUMIO.REFERRAL_HOW_BODY_1: Invite your friends via email, Facebook, Twitter, or WhatsApp
MYVOLUMIO.REFERRAL_HOW_BODY_2: They create a MyVolumio account via that link
MYVOLUMIO.REFERRAL_HOW_BODY_3: ...according to the milestone program and your subscription type
MYVOLUMIO.REFERRAL_FAQ_BODY_1: Simply share your unique link to a friend who would like to create a MyVolumio account
MYVOLUMIO.REFERRAL_FAQ_BODY_2: A referral is when your friend successfully signs up to MyVolumio via your unique referral link.
MYVOLUMIO.REFERRAL_FAQ_TITLE_3: How long is my unique link valid for?
MYVOLUMIO.REFERRAL_FAQ_BODY_3: Your unique link does not expire and you can use it at any time, unless Volumio decides to cancel the referral campaign.
MYVOLUMIO.REFERRAL_FAQ_TITLE_4: How can I check the status of my referral and the leaderboard?
MYVOLUMIO.REFERRAL_FAQ_BODY_4: You can see a real-time count of your referral and the leaderboard on the Volumio UI while logged in on your account.
MYVOLUMIO.REFERRAL_FAQ_TITLE_5: When do I receive my rewards?
MYVOLUMIO.REFERRAL_FAQ_BODY_5: Once your friend (s) creates a MyVolumio account and you achieve a milestone, you'll receive your referral in a manner of minutes.
MYVOLUMIO.REFERRAL_FAQ_TITLE_6: Do I need to insert payment information to receive my rewards?
MYVOLUMIO.REFERRAL_FAQ_BODY_6: Only users with a MyVolumio FREE account must insert payment payment to claim their rewards.
MYVOLUMIO.REFERRAL_FAQ_TITLE_7: Why are the rewards different for each subscription?
MYVOLUMIO.REFERRAL_FAQ_BODY_7: We separated the rewards according to the subscription type to be fair to all users, and get the rewards according to the value of the subscription.
MYVOLUMIO.REFERRAL_FAQ_TITLE_8: How many people can I refer?
MYVOLUMIO.REFERRAL_FAQ_BODY_8: The limit does not exist! The more you make, the closer you are to being in the Top 1!
MYVOLUMIO.MODAL_DISCOVERY_PREMIUM_HEADING: This feature is available for Volumio Superstar subscribers
MYVOLUMIO.MODAL_DISCOVERY_PREMIUM_TEXT: Enhanced metadata for your music and much more
MYVOLUMIO.LANDING_REFERRAL_WELCOME_TEXT1: Your friend told you about Volumio and invited you to try out? Great, Welcome!
MYVOLUMIO.LANDING_REFERRAL_WELCOME_TEXT2: If you are already familiar with Volumio, just sign up to enjoy lot of extra features. Otherwise, keep scrolling and find out the benefits we can give to your music listening experience.
MYVOLUMIO.ITS_FREE: It’s free and takes literally 1 minute.
MYVOLUMIO.LANDING_SHORT_INTRO: Volumio is an audiophile music player that gathers all your music - local and streaming - into one place. It’s easy to get started!
MYVOLUMIO.LANDING_INSTALL_TEXT: Available for PC, Raspberry PI and other devices.
MYVOLUMIO.LANDING_CONNECT_TEXT: After installation connect to your network and sign in to MyVolumio.
MYVOLUMIO.LANDING_CONTROL_TEXT: Access and manage your music from your smartphone or computer.
MYVOLUMIO.LANDING_FEATURES_TEXT: The Volumio platform is open source and free forever. However, if you are a real audio fan we provide an even better experience through MyVolumio’s extra feature set.
MYVOLUMIO.LANDING_FEATURE_INTEGRATIONS_TEXT: Have access to TIDAL and QOBUZ streaming for a bit-perfect Hi-Res streaming playback. Integration available also for Alexa and Highresaudio.com. With it you can avoid DLNA resampling and compatibility issues.
MYVOLUMIO.LANDING_FEATURE_DISCOVERY_TEXT: Learn about artists, albums, recording studio, credits list, from all the music on your local files and for MyVolumio compatible services such as Tidal, Qobuz, Spotify, and more.
MYVOLUMIO.LANDING_FEATURE_BACKUP_TEXT: All your favorites, Playlists and web radios are automatically synced to all your devices and backed-up to a secure location, ready to be restored whenever you set-up a new MyVolumio device.
MYVOLUMIO.LANDING_FEATURE_CD_TEXT: Rediscover your CD collection by simply attaching any USB CD Rom drive to your Volumio device. Play or copy your CDs in the most accurate way.

MYVOLUMIO_PLANS.MYVOLUMIO_6_DEVICES: Use MyVolumio on up to 6 devices
MYVOLUMIO_PLANS.REMOTE_CONNECTION_6_DEVICES: Remote connection to up to 6 devices
